title: Zero-Knowledge Proofs in Practice
description: An introduction to zero-knowledge proof systems and their real-world applications in privacy-preserving cryptocurrencies.
paper: Zerocash: Decentralized Anonymous Payments from Bitcoin
authors: Eli Ben-Sasson, Alessandro Chiesa, Christina Garman, Matthew Green, Ian Miers, Eran Tromer, Madars Virza

title: Post-Quantum Cryptography: Preparing for the Quantum Era
description: Exploring lattice-based cryptographic schemes and their resistance to quantum computer attacks. Discussed the NIST PQC standardization process and candidate algorithms.
authors: Roberto Avanzi, Joppe Bos, Léo Ducas, Eike Kiltz, Tancrède Lepoint, Vadim Lyubashevsky, John M. Schanck, Peter Schwabe, Damien Stehlé
